episodes.title: Cult of the Real Housewife Pt  2  Mary Cosby, Power, Money & Control Inside RHOSLC
episodes.description:
In Cult of the Real Housewife Pt. 2, we continue examining the origins of Mary Cosby’s church and the disturbing power dynamics that predate Real Housewives of Salt Lake City.

Using timelines, historical reporting, and family accounts, we explore:• How Mary’s grandmother built the church• Robert Sr.’s rise to power• Allegations of manipulation and abuse• The controversial marriage timeline• Why half the church walked out• And how leadership turned into control
This episode is about patterns, not personalities — and why reality TV didn’t create this story, it just exposed it.

episodes.title: The Cult of the Real Housewife: Mary Cosby EXPOSED | RHOSLC’s Darkest Secret (Part 1)
episodes.description:
In Part 1 of The Cult of the Real Housewife, we examine Mary Cosby, her role on Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, and the troubling allegations surrounding her church.

This episode explores:

Claims of financial exploitation

Alleged emotional and spiritual abuse

Audio of Mary berating her congregation

Family members are calling her a fraud

Why former members say the church fits cult-like patterns

And how RHOSLC gave her credibility and access to a wider audience

This commentary is based on on-air footage, public statements, and firsthand accounts — not speculation.

Part 2 will go even deeper.

episodes.description:
Mary Cosby’s church allegations on Real Housewives of Salt Lake City continue to resurface — and what’s most troubling isn’t just the claims themselves, but how comfortable people seem brushing them off.
